content: if you have fallen in love with a ribbon yarn or have a few yards left over from another project this is a good way to use it up most scarves will need less than 25 yards i purposefully did not put any gauge/hook/yarn details here because it depends entirely on your choice of ribbon the pattern discusses some aspects of how to choose a ribbon and a matching/contrasting yarn it also says what yarns/ribbons i used for the two projects shown please note this pattern uses u s crochet terminology
